title: How to unsubscribe from Birchbox
description: Birchbox is a monthly subscription service that delivers personalized beauty and grooming samples. To cancel your Birchbox subscription, follow these steps:

web.title: Cancel Birchbox Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your Birchbox subscription via their website, follow these steps:

*   Go to the Birchbox website and log in to your account.
*   Navigate to 'Account Settings' or 'Manage Subscriptions'.
*   Look for the option to 'Cancel Subscription' or 'Turn Off Auto-Renewal'.
*   Follow the on-screen prompts to confirm the cancellation.
*   Ensure you cancel before the 1st of the month to avoid being billed for the next month's box.
*   Save a screenshot or record of your cancellation confirmation for your records.

email.title: Contact Birchbox Support via Email
email.description:
If you encounter any issues or prefer to cancel via email, follow these steps:

*   Contact Birchbox support at info@birchbox.com or support@birchbox.co.uk for assistance if needed.

seo_text: Cancel Birchbox subscription. Steps to cancel Birchbox. How to stop Birchbox subscription. Birchbox cancellation guide. Unsubscribe from Birchbox.
